quizzes.title: Is This a Red Flag or Green Flag?

questions.text: They take 6+ hours to reply but are always on social media
They remember small details you mentioned weeks ago

quizzes.title: Can You Avoid These Logic Traps?
quizzes.hook: Your brain will try to trick you.

questions.text: A bat and ball cost $1.10. The bat costs $1 more than the ball. How much is the ball?
If it takes 5 machines 5 minutes to make 5 widgets, how long would it take 100 machines to make 100 widgets?
In a lake, there's a patch of lily pads. Every day, the patch doubles in size. If it takes 48 days to cover the lake, how long to cover half?
A farmer has 17 sheep. All but 9 die. How many are left?
How many times can you subtract 5 from 25?

results.title: Tricked ü™§
results.description: Your brain took the shortcuts. These questions are designed to fool quick thinking.

results.title: Partially Fooled ü§î
results.description: You caught some traps but fell for others. Slow down and think twice.

results.title: Sharp Thinker üéØ
results.description: You avoided most traps. You think before you answer.

results.title: Trap-Proof üß†
results.description: Perfect! You don't fall for cognitive shortcuts.

quizzes.title: Are You a People Pleaser?
quizzes.hook: Saying yes when you mean no.

questions.text: Do you say yes when you want to say no?
Do you apologize for things that aren't your fault?
Do you avoid conflict at all costs?
Do others' opinions affect your self-worth?
Do you over-explain your decisions?
Do you neglect your needs for others?
Do you feel responsible for others' emotions?
Do you fear rejection intensely?

results.title: Healthy Boundaries üíö

results.title: Mild Pleasing üü°

results.title: People Pleaser üü†

results.title: Chronic Pleaser üòä

questions.text: How do you handle criticism?

results.title: Average Maturity üå±

results.title: Mature Mind üå≥

results.title: Wise Beyond Years ü¶â

questions.text: Is your happiness dependent on your partner?

results.title: Some Dependence üü°

results.title: Codependent üü†

results.title: Deeply Codependent üîó

quizzes.title: Do You Have Main Character Syndrome?

questions.text: Do you often imagine people watching or judging you?
Do you romanticize your own struggles?
Do you think your life would make a good movie?

Do minor inconveniences feel like major plot points?
Do you feel like you have a special destiny?
Do you curate moments for how they'll look/sound?

results.title: Lead Character üé¨

results.title: Full Main Character üëë

quizzes.title: Are You Trauma Bonded?

questions.text: Do you defend them despite constant hurt?
Do you feel you can't live without them?

Have you tried to leave but always go back?
Do they control you through fear or guilt?
Do you feel addicted to them despite the pain?

results.title: Some Signs üü°

results.title: Strong Trauma Bond ‚õìÔ∏è

questions.text: Can you identify your emotions as you feel them?

Do you adapt well to social situations?
Can you bounce back from emotional setbacks?
